Namespace List
Here is a list of all documented namespaces with brief descriptions:

 ▼Nbitpit
 NadaptionThe namespace 'adaption' contains the routines and the data structures for handling patch adaption

 NgenericIORoutines for reading/writing in ASCII/BINARY format
 NlevelSetDefaultsNamespace containing default values
 NlinearalgebraCollection of functions to create and solve small linear systems

 NpatchThe namespace 'patch' contains routines for interacting with the patch manager
 NpodThe namespace 'pod' contains structures for working with the POD class
 NrbfUtility fuctions for RBF
 NstlUtility fuctions for STL IO
